actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to ensure area agencies receive adequate funding, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to require that area agencies on aging located in States that have at least one area agency representing Indian tribes receive at least the same amount of funding for State and community programs on aging as they received in FY 1988.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to ensure area agencies receive adequate funding, and for other purposes.
